verses.name: Numbers 31:12
verses.text: And they brought the captives, and the prey, and the spoil, unto Moses, and Eleazar the priest, and unto the congregation of the children of Israel, unto the camp at the plains of Moab, which are by Jordan near Jericho.

verses.name: Numbers 31:13
verses.text: And Moses, and Eleazar the priest, and all the princes of the congregation, went forth to meet them without the camp.

verses.name: Numbers 31:14
verses.text: And Moses was wroth with the officers of the host, with the captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, which came from the battle.

verses.name: Numbers 31:15
verses.text: And Moses said unto them, Have ye saved all the women alive?
